name: cypress_test_api
description: Projeto para testes de api usando Cypress

scripts.cypress-local-test-linux: export CYPRESS_BASE_URL='' && export DATABASE_URL='' && npx cypress run
scripts.cypress-local-open-linux: export CYPRESS_BASE_URL='' && export DATABASE_URL='' && npx cypress open
scripts.cypress-local-test-windows: set CYPRESS_BASE_URL=''&& set DATABASE_URL=''&& npx cypress run
scripts.cypress-local-open-windows: set CYPRESS_BASE_URL=''&& set DATABASE_URL=''&& npx cypress open

author: Angele Louise
